reviews.title: Phone Slow
reviews.content: The phone takes too long to start up. You can actually visit a washroom and come back and still it isn't up. And sometimes the apps are unresponsive. And don't try playing games with it...you'll end up getting annoyed and breaking it up altogether.
reviews.author: Jimmy

reviews.title: Phone Slow
reviews.content: The phone takes too long to start up. You can actually visit a washroom and come back and still it isn't up. And sometimes the apps are unresponsive. And don't try playing games with it...you'll end up getting annoyed and breaking it up altogether.
reviews.author: Jimmy

reviews.title: Everything about the phone is cool
reviews.content: Cool and nice product I like it
reviews.author: Isaac

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.content:
It's good 
Do you have full case of Nokia 2.4 phone
reviews.author: wilson.mwaura@uonbi.ac.ke
